SELECT A.UUID, A.TITTLE, A.CONTENT, B.KNOWLEDGETYPE_NAME, DATE_FORMAT(A.CREATETIME, '%Y-%c-%d %H:%i:%s') AS CREATETIME FROM H_HEALTHKNOWLEDGE A LEFT JOIN H_KNOWLEDGETYPE B ON A.CLASSIFICATION = B.KNOWLEDGETYPE_CODE
WHERE A.TITTLE LIKE "%"#{KEYWORD}"%" OR A.CONTENT LIKE "%"#{KEYWORD}"%" OR B.KNOWLEDGETYPE_NAME LIKE "%"#{KEYWORD}"%"
ORDER BY A.CREATETIME DESC

SELECT COUNT(1) FROM H_HEALTHKNOWLEDGE A LEFT JOIN H_KNOWLEDGETYPE B ON A.CLASSIFICATION = B.KNOWLEDGETYPE_CODE
WHERE A.TITTLE LIKE "%"#{KEYWORD}"%" OR A.CONTENT LIKE "%"#{KEYWORD}"%" OR B.KNOWLEDGETYPE_NAME LIKE "%"#{KEYWORD}"%"
SELECT A.KNOWLEDGETYPE_CODE, A.KNOWLEDGETYPE_NAME FROM H_KNOWLEDGETYPE A WHERE A.DELETE_FLAG = 0
